# Custom Components

In this example we will build a *Mario button* with sounds and animations heaviliy inspired by [this great video tutorial by Trevor Manzt](https://youtu.be/oZhyilx3gqI?si=dFPFiHua4TuuqCpu), the creator of [AnyWidget](https://anywidget.dev/).

![Mario chime button](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/24403730/311924409-e8befac9-3ce5-4ffc-a9df-3b18479c809a.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..VPirrIBLCuIi1OYsuGeHbEtIfV6bavkUHNUkyrvj1_Q)
